# Using the ciphertext from the lab document
python rsa_lab4.py --ciphertext 

# Using an interactive prompt for the ciphertext
python rsa_lab4.py

# Print the RSA key parameters along with the decryption
python rsa_lab4.py --info --ciphertext

python rsa_lab4.py --key path/to/private_key.pem

# Output the decrypted value without flag formatting
python rsa_lab4.py --format raw
